title: Send Bulk Tenant Notice
description: The water will be shut off for building-wide plumbing repairs. The manager must notify all tenants in the building.

tasks.description: Draft a clear notice explaining the reason, date, and time of the water shut-off.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a concise and informative notice.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all current tenants in the affected building.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly pulls the list of tenants for the specific property.

tasks.description: Send the notice to all tenants via email and post physical copies in common areas.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully distributes the notice through multiple channels.
